ai-kv7.8:1.1_0: results in old age and death.
ai-kv7.8:1.3_0: connected with pleasant feeling, associated with painful feeling, with a mind associated with pleasant feeling, painful feeling, and neutral feeling.
ai-kv7.8:1.4_0: There is the place where there is kamma, the nutriment consisting of “linking” is said.
ai-kv7.8:1.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:1.7_0: But there is no cycle of rebirths ...
ai-kv7.8:1.9_0: If there’s no feeling, relishing of pleasure and pain.
ai-kv7.8:1.10_0: But there is no cycle for him to be spoken, Revata, and you have said:
ai-kv7.8:2.5_0: The results of old age and death ...
ai-kv7.8:2.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:3.1_0: The results of old age and death, feeling ...
ai-kv7.8:3.2_0: But there is no cycle of rebirths ...
ai-kv7.8:3.5_0: But there is no cycle of rebirths ...
ai-kv7.8:3.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:4.3_0: for skillful qualities decline while skillful qualities grow.
ai-kv7.8:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:5.1_0: and skillful qualities should not be spoken to.
ai-kv7.8:5.4_0: and unskillful qualities are not to be spoken of.
ai-kv7.8:5.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:6.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:7.1_0: and unskillful qualities are not to be spoken of.
ai-kv7.8:7.4_0: and skillful qualities should not be spoken to.
ai-kv7.8:7.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:8.1_0: When there is skillful qualities, unskillful qualities grow, and the result of old age and death.
ai-kv7.8:8.3_0: When there is skillful qualities, unskillful qualities grow, and skillful qualities.
ai-kv7.8:8.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:9.1_0: When skillful qualities are not to be spoken of,
ai-kv7.8:9.4_0: When skillful qualities are not to be spoken of,
ai-kv7.8:9.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.8:10.4_0: Doesn’t you have a short life that is neither short-lived, nor will they live happily?
ai-kv7.8:10.6_0: And there is an ugly deed that is neither short-lived, current, and will proceed having performed
ai-kv7.8:10.8_0: The result of old age and death is finished.
